Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.Tracke.title: Tracked Resource
Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.Tracke.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

Cluster.description: A logical cluster within a datacenter.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ClusterListResult.description: The response of a Cluster list operation.

value.description: The Cluster items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this rack.

ClusterResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

DeviceLogicalPort.description: A logical port that resides on a device in the network.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

DeviceLogicalPortListResult.description: The response of a DeviceLogicalPort list operation.

value.description: The DeviceLogicalPort items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeviceLogicalPortProperties.description: The properties of a logical port.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this port.

deviceId.description: The Azure resource ID of the device (e.g., NIC or Switch) this port resides on.

macAddress.description: The MAC address of the port.

nameOnDevice.description: The port's name on the device (e.g., Ethernet 1/1).

linkId.description: The Azure resource ID of the link that the port is interfaced with.

clusterId.description: The Azure resource ID of the cluster that the port is associated with, if any.

DeviceLogicalPortResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

DeviceResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

Link.description: A network link between two devices within a datacenter.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

LinkListResult.description: The response of a Link list operation.

value.description: The Link items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this link

deviceOneId.description: The Azure resource ID of the first device connected via this network link.

deviceLogicalPortOneId.description: The Azure resource ID of the port that this network link is connected to the first device.

deviceTwoId.description: The Azure resource ID of the second device connected via this network link.

deviceLogicalPortTwoId.description: The Azure resource ID of the port that this network link is connected to the second device.

planeId.description: The ID of the plane that this link is associated with.

clusterId.description: The Azure resource ID of the cluster that the rack is associated with, if any.

LinkResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

MaintenanceRequestResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

Nic.description: A NIC (Network Interface Card) within a rack.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

NicListResult.description: The response of a Nic list operation.

value.description: The Nic items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

hardwareSku.description: The SKU of the physical NIC hardware.

macAddress.description: The MAC address of the NIC.

parentDeviceId.description: The Azure resource ID of the device that the NIC resides within.

pcieSlot.description: The PCIe slot that the NIC is installed in on the parent device.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this NIC.

Node.description: A node (baremetal compute resource) within a rack.

value.description: The Node items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

assetId.description: The asset ID of the node.

hardwareSku.description: The SKU of the physical node hardware.

hostname.description: The hostname of the node in the logical network.

nodeId.description: The unique identifier of the logical node.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this node.

Supercomputer.description: A supercomputer composed of topological entities.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Supercomputer items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

siteId.description: The identifier of the physical site where the supercomputer hardware is located.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on the supercomputer.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Resource has been created.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Resource creation failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: Resource creation was canceled.

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The resource operation has been accepted.

values.name: Provisioning
values.description: The resource is currently being provisioned.

values.name: Validating
values.description: The resource is currently being validated.

values.name: Updating
values.description: The resource is currently being updated.

values.name: Deleting
values.description: The resource is currently being deleted.

values.name: Fairwater
values.description: A supercomputer in a Fairwater site.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

SwitchListResult.description: The response of a Switch list operation.

value.description: The Switch items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SwitchNetworkType.description: The type of the network the switch resides in.

values.name: BackendScaleUp
values.description: The switch is within a scale-up backend network.

values.name: BackendScaleOut
values.description: The switch is within a scale-out backend network.

values.name: Frontend
values.description: The switch is within a frontend network.

SwitchPacketCaptureMatchRule.description: A match rule to filter packets upon capture.

destinationIpPrefix.description: The allowed destination prefix of the packets to capture.

id.description: The ID of the match rule.

protocol.description: The protocol of the packets to capture.

sourceIpPrefix.description: The allowed source prefix of the packets to capture.

SwitchPacketCaptureMatchRuleProtocol.description: The protocols of which to match IP prefix for in a match rule.

values.name: Ipv4
values.description: Match over IPv4 prefixes.

values.name: Ipv6
values.description: Match over IPv6 prefixes.

SwitchPacketCaptureRequest.description: The request body for a packet capture action over a switch.

destinationLocation.description: The location to store captured packets, such as a Storage Account Blob URI.

durationInSeconds.description: The duration of the packet capture in seconds.

interfaces.description: The interfaces over which to capture packets.

matchRules.description: The match rules to apply to the packet capture.

SwitchPacketCaptureResult.description: The result of a packet capture action over a switch.

faultCode.description: The fault code, if the operation failed.

faultMessage.description: The fault message, if the operation failed.

status.description: The status of the packet capture action.

SwitchPacketCaptureResultStatus.description: The status of a packet capture action over a switch.

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The packet capture request has been accepted.

values.name: Running
values.description: The packet capture is still in progress.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The packet capture completed successfully.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The packet capture failed.

SwitchPacketCaptureTrafficDirection.description: The traffic directions to filter over when performing packet capture.

values.name: All
values.description: Match all traffic.

values.name: Egress
values.description: Match only egress traffic from the switch.

values.name: Ingress
values.description: Match only ingress traffic to the switch.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on this switch

hardwareSku.description: The SKU of the switch hardware.

networkType.description: The network type of the switch.

clusterId.description: The Azure resource ID of the cluster that the switch is associated with, if any.

SwitchRetrieveDataOutput.description: The output of a retrieve data action over a switch.

faultCode.description: The fault code, if the operation failed.

faultMessage.description: The fault message, if the operation failed.

path.description: The gNMI path of the read operation.

value.description: The value of the read operation.

SwitchRetrieveDataRequest.description: The request body a retrieve data action over a switch.

paths.description: The gNMI paths of the read operation.

SwitchRetrieveDataResult.description: The result of a retrieve data action over a switch.

value.description: The value of the retrieve data action.
